snippet: The insider trading case against a former Goldman director continued and a bankruptcy filing represented the largest law firm collapse in United States history. A look back on our reporting of the past week's highs and lows in finance.
abstract: The insider trading case against a former Goldman director continued and a bankruptcy filing represented the largest law firm collapse in United States history. A look back on our reporting of the past week's highs and lows in finance.

headline.main: DealBook's Week in Review: Trials and Default
